solidfire.custom package¶

Module contents¶

Module contains user defined objects directly implemented to map to the Element API.

class solidfire.custom.CHAPSecret(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: solidfire.common.model.DataObject

A representation of the CHAP Secret

Parameters:secret – [required] A 12 - 16 character string.
auto_generate()[source]¶

Used in ‘AddAccount’ and ‘ModifyAccount’ to cause a CHAP Secret to be auto generated by the cluster.

classmethod custom_extract(data)[source]¶

Deserialize the property from json.

Parameters:data – the data to be converted.
Returns:the extracted data.

Custom json serialize logic :return:

secret = <class 'str'>¶
class solidfire.custom.Frequency(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: solidfire.common.model.DataObject

User Defined object (does not correlate to and API Object) which simplifies the construction of Snapshot Schedule objects.

param minutes:Number of minutes between snapshots or the minute at

which the snapshot will occur in “Days of Week”, or “Days of Month” mode. Valid values 0 - 59 :type minutes: int

Parameters:hours – Number of hours between snapshots or hour at which the

snapshot will occur in “Days of Week”, or “Days of Month” mode. Valid values 0 - 24 :type hours: int

Parameters:monthdays – The days of the month that a snapshot will be made.

Valid values 1 - 31 :type monthdays: int

Parameters:weekdays – Day of the week the snapshot is to be created.

Required Values (if used) Day - 0 - 6 (Sunday - Saturday). :type weekdays: Weekday[]

Parameters:days (int[]) – Time Interval days between snapshot.
days = <class 'int[]'>¶
hours = <class 'int'>¶
minutes = <class 'int'>¶
monthdays = <class 'int[]'>¶

class solidfire.custom.FrequencyTypes[source]¶

Bases: object

User Defined object (does not correlate to and API Object) which enumerates the different types of Snapshot Schedules.

Days_Of_Month = 'Days Of Month'¶
Days_Of_Week = 'Days Of Week'¶
Time_Interval = 'Time Interval'¶
types = {'Days Of Week', 'Time Interval', 'Days Of Month'}¶
